Attributes.description: Introduction to systems engineering; applications of decision-making, modelling, and programming, including probabilistic analyses and optimization, to civil engineering projects; review of numerical methods
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: All of MATH 152, CIVL 201, STAT 251.
